name: Rahul Kumar
title: Payroll & Compliance Specialist
summary: 14+ years in Indian payroll & statutory compliance, managing payroll for 7000+ employees across multiple states. Expert in PF, ESIC, NPS, Bonus, Gratuity and payroll automation.
highlights: Managing end-to-end payroll operations for 7000+ employees.
Ensuring 100% statutory compliance (PF, ESIC, Bonus, Gratuity, LWF).
Automations using Excel VBA & Power Automate.
